title: Not Knowing the Faith We Used to Believe In
description:
What do we mean by the word "religion"? The public definition is changing fast with the rise of the work which asks like a religion but doesn't have anything "supernatural" about it. 

My conversation with James Lindsay https://youtu.be/sZ520OLvDZs
Peter Boshossian Aquila Report https://www.theaquilareport.com/welcome-to-culture-war-2-0-the-great-realignment/
Benjamin Boyce Woke and White Supremacists https://youtu.be/OYht4Lu_19w
Dark Horse Podcast Black Intellectuals https://youtu.be/pHGt733yw3g
Matt Taibbi with Bret Weinstein https://youtu.be/xojSWHrar9A
Al Franken Amy Barrett Confirmation Hearing https://youtu.be/aOlrLPXB9a0
Glenn Loury David Kaiser https://youtu.be/15A2s08_dig
American Religious History https://amzn.to/3hiEWkn
Jonathan Pageau the Stories We Live in https://youtu.be/pTsRnW6baO0
Not Choosing a Faith You Believe In https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2017/oct/15/living-without-shared-religion-neil-macgregor-living-with-gods-radio-4
COVID Immunity The Atlantic https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2020/07/could-covid-19-immunity-really-disappear-months/614377/
Christine Hayes Meta Divine Realm https://youtu.be/wRPqtGywkCw
Tom Holland did religion exist in the ancient world https://youtu.be/ZeCTC_r4vMI
John Walton Ancient Near East Thought and the Old Testament https://amzn.to/3eM8OUK
The Problem of Pain https://amzn.to/32DrO5f
The History of Christianity in the Reformation Era https://amzn.to/3fNVpN8
Philosophy and Religion in the West https://amzn.to/2WD6ucs
Heavenly Participation https://amzn.to/3hm86ze
The Clockwork Universe https://amzn.to/30w1rLN
The Mind and the Market https://amzn.to/3eOxxHZ
New York Tough Poster https://www.governor.ny.gov/new-york-tough-poster
Dave Rubin Finochio https://youtu.be/ZsRTBKaUTVg

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/
